title: As a user I want to be able to run the CSP Detail by Club - Adjusted Liability report
custom_steps:
Report Layout: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Club+Adjusted+Liability+-+Report+Layout

Report Details: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Club+Adjusted+Liability+-+Report+Detail

Report Logic: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=90905016

Report Prompts: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Club+Adjusted+Liability+-+Prompts

Acceptance Criteria: 
* "CSP Detail by Club - Adjusted Liability report" is a report in the Report listing widget. Selecting this report from the widget will launch the prompts according to the requirements. 
* Entering the desired prompts and running the report will work and match the requirements.  
* The report will have an LDAP associated with it. Please provide the LDAP when the story is delivered and a user id to test the report and security with.

title: As a user I want to be able to run the Employee Allowances - BOC Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN a BOC user logs in
custom_steps: WHEN user is in Report listing widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Employee Allowances - BOC" should be listed 
AND Selecting this report from the widget will launch the prompts according to the requirements. 
AND The category of this report should be "Employees". 
AND Entering the desired prompts and running the report will work and match the requirements. 
AND The report will have an LDAP associated with it. Please provide the LDAP when the story is delivered and a user id to test the report and security with.

Report Layout: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Employee+Allowances+BOC+-+Report+Layout

Report Details: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Employee+Allowances+BOC+-+Report+Details

Report Logic: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=118481678

Report Prompts: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Employee+Allowances+BOC+-+Prompts

View Story: #152124196

title: As a user I want to be able to run the International Registration Admin Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN Club or BOC user logs
custom_steps: WHEN user is in reporting widget
custom_expected:
THEN "International Registration Admin Report" report will be in the Report listing widget. Selecting this report from the widget will launch the prompts according to the requirements. 
AND The category of this report should be "International". 
AND Entering the desired prompts and running the report will work and match the requirements. 
AND The report will continue to use the existing LDAP. 
AND This is a BOC only report.

Report Layout: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/International+Reg+Admin+-+Report+Layout

Report Details: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/International+Reg+Admin+-+Report+Details

Report Logic: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=89347945

Report Prompts: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/International+Reg+Admin+-+Report+Prompts

Report Security: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/International+Reg+Admin+-+Security+-+Frequency

title: As a User, I want to run the Rule 4 Player Listing Report
custom_steps:
Report Layout:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/EBIS4-TXT-1549+Report+Layout

Report Details:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/EBIS4-TXT-1550+Report+Details

Logic and Sorting:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/EBIS4-TXT-1551+Logic+and+Sort+Considerations

Prompts:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/EBIS4-TXT-1555+Prompts

Note:  This report will combine:
 - Rule 4 Player Listing - Drafted
 - Rule 4 Player Listing - Eligible
 - Rule 4 Player Listing - Passed Over
 - Rule 4 Player Listing - Pending Eligible
 - Rule 4 Player Listing - Previously Selected Not Eligible

title: As a user I want to run the CBT/ LRD Player Details Reports
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the Report Listings widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects 'Payrolls - Player Details' report from the listing widget 
AND selects "CB" or "LRD" from Payroll Type drop down
AND click OK
custom_expected:
THEN 
"C.B. Tax Payrolls - Player Details" or "LRD 40-Man Payrolls - Player Details" report will be launched depending on the selection. Entering the desired prompts and running the report will work and match the requirements.
